mapper.select:
select a.ifmmSeq , a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmDob , concat(substring(b.ifmpNumber,1,3),"-",substring(b.ifmpNumber,4,4),"-",substring(b.ifmpNumber,7,4)) as ifmpPhone ,(select ifcdName from infrcode where ifmmGenderCd=ifcdseq) as ifmmGender ,c.ifmeEmailFull ,d.ifnaName ,a.ifmmPushConsentNy from infrMember a left join infrmemberphone b on b.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and b.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 left join infrmemberEmail c on c.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and c.ifmeDefaultNy = 1
left join infrmembernationalty e on e.ifmmseq=a.ifmmseq and ifmnDefaultNy=1 left join infrnationalty d on d.ifnaseq=e.ifnaseq where 1=1
